content.rendered:
Amanzi was founded by two engineers who had a dream to change the way that the plumbing and heating industry is represented. We wanted to build a company based on professionalism, great service and fantastic workmanship. We take pride in our brand and value our customers support immensely.

Team Amanzi is motivated by our dream and passion for what we do. Every member of our team is always learning and upgrading their skills to deliver a high-quality service at an affordable price.

Don’t just take our word for it. Our success and reviews say it all….

From my first contact with Adam and Shane at Amanzi, they were extremely professional, courteous and knowledgeable. They took time to understand my requirements and prepared a full and exacting quote. It wasn’t the cheapest quote I had received, but they were able to make some savings and I felt very comfortable choosing them to proceed with the work, feeling we would get value for money. We are extremely satisfied with the finished job and in-between both attended multiple ’emergency’ call outs to try and resurrect the old, failing system and I couldn’t be more grateful. Highly recommended!

Customer in Bagshot

Our work was a long project due to the nature of the build, however, throughout, Amanzi were brilliant. They were professional, flexible, reliable, dedicated and super responsive to questions and queries we had and were extremely patient. They are personable and work quickly and were a pleasure to have on site. They gave us good advice as we progressed and we’re extremely happy with are decision to use them for such an important part of our build. We wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them and have done already to others commencing projects.

Customer in Reading

Fantastic quality, and completed on time and exactly as agreed. Shane kept me up to date throughout the job even coming round after work to check we were happy with everything and if he could explain anything about how the water softener worked.

Customer in Chertsey
Tombstone Services Ltd
Previous Next
